anya-e0806n1:88_11: niccaṁ pakkhevā paralopo siyāti honticcādo niccaṁ,

anya-e0806n1:88_15: tattha honticcādiko nicca pakkho paralopasseva visayo,
anya-e0806n1:88_16: latāvātiādiko aniccapakkho ubhayasādhāraṇattā pubbalopassāpi visayoti iminā niccaṁ pakkhe vā paralopo hoti,
anya-e0806n1:88_17: asantapakkho pana saddhindriyantiādiko pubbalopasseva visayo sabbathānena pariccattattā”ti,
anya-e0806n1:88_18: tīsupi cetesu pana pakkhesu niccāniccapakkhesu yevassāpavādarūpatā…
anya-e0806n1:88_19: pubbalopassa sabbathā honticcādo nivārakattā vā vidhāyakattā vā paralopassa,
anya-e0806n1:88_22: lokaggotiādi tu kvacisaddassa payogānusāritā dīpakattā nicce asantevāpi vidhimhi dīpite paralopena vā nipphajjatīti neṭṭhabyāghāto,
anya-e0806n1:88_23: evaṁ tāva kvaciggahaṇe sabbathāniṭṭhaparihārena iṭṭhappasiddhi siyā,
anya-e0806n1:88_26: pariyāyena bhavantīti kvaciggahaṇābhāve ‘paro’ti suttaṁ siyā tathā sati suttadvayamekavisayaṁ tulyabalañca siyā,
anya-e0806n1:88_27: tattha vippaṭisedhābhāvā pamāṇabhūtānamācariya (vacanā)naṁ niratthakatā mā bhavīti vārena bhavantīti attho,
anya-e0806n1:88_29: pakkheyeva siyāti latāvātiādīsu pubbalope pariyāyappavatte pariyāyena paralopassāppavattito latāvāti pakkheyeva paralopo bhaveyya,
anya-e0806n1:88_39: Nacevamiṭṭhanti evamidaṁ yathāvuttaṁ vikappavidhānaṁ saddalakkhaṇaññūhi nevābhimatanti attho,
anya-e0806n1:88_42: nena pariccattaṭṭhāne ussaggappavattiyā latāva latevāti rūpadvayaṁ sampajjati tasmā payogānusāritādīpakena
anya-e0806n1:88_43: kvacisaddeneva honti saddhindriyaṁ latāva latevāti payoga sambhavopi,
anya-e0806n1:88_44: tathāpi aniccapakkhe latāivāti tatiyarūpappasiddhiyā pariyāyena bhavitabbanti parikappeti ‘nanu cetyādinā,
anya-e0806n1:88_45: atha “paro kvacī’ti kvaciggahaṇe sati apa(vādarūpa)ttā kathampariyāyappavattīti manasi nidhāyāniccapakkhe
anya-e0806n1:88_46: pariyāyappavattidīpanatthaṁ “na dvevā”ti suttitanti apavāde rūpattayepi pariyāyappavattiyaṁ dosābhāvamāha-
anya-e0806n1:88_48: tathāhiccādinā “na dvevā”ti sutteneva pariyāyassāpi dīpitattaṁ sādheti,
anya-e0806n1:88_49: sā ca ekatthappavatti pariyāyaṁ vinā na sambhavati…
anya-e0806n1:88_51: nanu ca kvacābhāve pariyāyappavattiyaṁ yathāvutta dosassevāppasaṅgato mā hotu pariyāyo,
anya-e0806n1:88_52: bhinnavisaye pana pubbaparalopappavattiyā “na dvevā’ti nisedhe lateva latāva latāivāti rūpattayaṁ nipphajjatīti codanaṁ manasi nidhāyāha-
anya-e0806n1:88_58: vikappena vā katthaci yathodakaṁ yathāudakaṁ tyādo pubbalopasseva katthaci itipi iccapiccādo paralopasseva
anya-e0806n1:88_59: katthaci lateva latāva latāivāccādo pariyāyenubhayalopasseva dassanatoti sambandho,
anya-e0806n1:88_60: etthaca itipīti vavatthitavibhāsatta dīpanena kvacisaddena paralope kate-
anya-e0806n1:88_61: ññatra pubba lope sampatte “na dvevā”ti etthānuvattamāna kvacānubhāvena niccaṁ nisedhe iccapicceva bhavati.
anya-e0806n1:90_1: tathā ca sati aññoññānajjhāsi taṁ yathodakaṁ yathāudakaṁtyādi itipi iccapiccādica saṅgahitaṁ bhavatīti,
anya-e0806n1:90_2: pubbalope paralope ca pariyāyena sampatte dvinnampi pakkhe abhāve sati kathamidaṁ yujjatīti codeti‘yajjeva’miccādinā,
anya-e0806n1:90_3: yajjevanti hi ayaṁ nipātasamudāyo aniṭṭhāpādanārambha vattate,
anya-e0806n1:90_9: vattumiṭṭhattāti iminā sannikaṁso vaṇṇāna maddhamattakālabyavadhānā paccāsatti,
anya-e0806n1:90_10: sannikaṁsassetassa vacanicchāyaṁ satiyeva sandhikāriyaṁ hotīti dīpeti,
anya-e0806n1:90_16: kālantarenāti ubhayattha ṭhitavaṇṇāna muccāraṇakālato aññena majjhappatitakālena,
anya-e0806n1:90_20: yadipi sabbampetaṁ yajjevaṁtyādinā vuttaṁ kvaci saddappabhāveneva sijjhati,
anya-e0806n1:90_22: yampi satthe yojetabbo vāti dassetuṁ vutto.
anya-e0806n1:92_1: ‘yathākkamaṁ’ti tu vacanābhāve kathaṁ yathākkamantīdaṁ vuttanti āha-

anya-e0806n1:92_15: pare “satipi heṭṭhā vāggahaṇe‘kvacāsavaṇṇaṁ lutte’ti sutte kvaciggahaṇakaraṇato avaṇṇe eva lutte asavaṇṇo vidhi hoti,
anya-e0806n1:92_16: tato idha na hoti diṭṭhupādāna”nti vadanti,
anya-e0806n1:92_17: kvacīti adhikāro idha na hoti mahussavo mātūpaṭṭhānanti,
anya-e0806n1:92_19: tena samānādhikaraṇo urasaddopīti urasminti nicca samāsattā asakapadena viggahe kate “asaṅkhyaṁ vibhatti”ccādinā (3-
anya-e0806n1:92_22: ettha pana yuvaṇṇānanti saṁsāmi samīpasamūha vikārāvayavādīsu ṭhānyādesasambandhe chaṭṭhī,
anya-e0806n1:92_23: tasmā ivaṇṇuvaṇṇānaṁ ṭhāne e oādesā hontīti attho,
anya-e0806n1:92_24: ṭhānampana tidhā apakaṁso nivatti pasaṅgo ceti,
anya-e0806n1:92_25: tattha gunnaṁ ṭhāne assā sambandhīyantu bajjhantu (jinindabuddhi) ti apakaṁso ṭhānasaddassattho,
anya-e0806n1:92_26: “semhassa ṭhāne kaṭukamosadhaṁ dātabba”nti nivatti “dabbhānaṁ ṭhāne sarehi attharitabba”nti pasaṅgo,
anya-e0806n1:92_30: sutte atthābhidhānāya ivaṇṇuvaṇṇānaṁ pavattippasaṅge tadatthābhidhānāyeva eoādesā bhavantīti.
anya-e0806n1:94_1: 14) pubbassa kāriyavidhānato sattamī niddiṭṭhassa paratā viññāyatīti vuttiyaṁ ‘pare’ti vuttaṁ,

anya-e0806n1:100_0: Rassadīghānanti sutte avutte kathaṁ rassadīghānanti labhati uddesinoti āha-

anya-e0806n1:102_6: dve rūpānihontītyādi vacanamidaṁ padamidaṁ (potthake) dasseti “sarūpappadhānepi dvisadde dvisaddasāmaññena saṅkhyādvisaddānusiṭṭhaṁ nappayujjate,
anya-e0806n1:102_7: tassa (pana) saṅkhyeyyavacanasaṅkhyābhāvā ekavacanameva ( ) (pana) (potthake) hotī”ti, iminā ca-
anya-e0806n1:102_12: taṁ khaṇanti ettha ekaṅgavikalaṁ paccudāharaṇanti saramhā parattābhāvā na dvittaṁ.
anya-e0806n1:104_0: Tabbagge tatiyapaṭhamāti kasmā vuttaṁ catuttha (dutiya) saddehi vaggakkharesveva gayhamānesu tathā niddeso yutto,
anya-e0806n1:104_1: na hi catunnampūraṇo catuttho dvinnampūraṇo dutiyoti akkharāyeva vuccantīti āsaṅkiya ‘vināpī’tiādimāha,
anya-e0806n1:104_2: akkhare akkharavisaye catutthādi vohāro karīyamāno vaggaggahaṇaṁ vināpi vaggakkhareyeva ruḷho pasiddhoti sambandho,
anya-e0806n1:104_11: yathāyogganti catutthakkhare catutthassa tatiyo dutiyakkhare dutiyassa paṭhamoti evaṁ yoggamanatikkamma,
anya-e0806n1:104_12: dhassa dabhāvoti imināva pubbassa dhassa dattamupalakkheti,
anya-e0806n1:104_14: Theroti ettha ekāro vaggakkharo na hotīti tasmiṁ tavaggadutiyakkharassa tassa to paṭhamo na hoti.
anya-e0806n1:104_15: Panthoti ettha tavagga dutiyakkharena thakārena tabbaggabhūte nakāre satīpi na so tabbaggadutiyakkharoti na tassa paṭhamo to,
anya-e0806n1:106_5: tesu bhāravāhako koci tena pīḷito ‘aho bhāro’ti vattabbe sattivekallā ‘aho bāla’ iccāha,
anya-e0806n1:106_6: taṁsamīpavattī ‘kimayamāhe’ti kenaci puṭṭho samāno ‘aho bāla iccayamāhe’ti vadati,
anya-e0806n1:108_1: 36) votyanuvattiya avaṇṇe eonaṁ vo hotīti ca sakkā viññātuṁ,
anya-e0806n1:108_2: tathā sati ‘avaṇṇe kvaci vo hotī”ti vattabbaṁ ‘ahoti vā’ti kasmā vuttanti codanamāsaṅkiyāha-
anya-e0806n1:108_5: 31) vakārādesassa vijjamānattā vakārādesampati puna okāro ṭhānibhāvena niddisitabbo na siyāti adhippāyenāha,
anya-e0806n1:108_6: na nimittanti eonaṁ vakārādesatthaṁ avaṇṇo kāraṇaṁ na hotīti attho,
anya-e0806n1:108_10: sve bhavanti viggayha tanappaccaye taddhitavuttiyaṁ vibhattiyā “ekatthatāyaṁ”ti (2-

anya-e0806n1:110_0: Katha‘māgamo hotī’ti vuttaṁ yadi niggahītamāgamo siyā sutte āgamaggahaṇena vā bhavitabbaṁ ña- ma-
anya-e0806n1:110_7: tathā sati āgaminiddesābhāvā āgamattampi na siyāti codeti ‘yajjeva’miccādinā, na-
anya-e0806n1:110_8: iti codanaṁ paṭikkhipitvā tassa āgamattameva sādhetumāha-
anya-e0806n1:110_14: purimā jātīti visesanasamāsekate rasse ca bindvāgamo,
anya-e0806n1:110_17: satipi payogānusārittadīpakassa kvacisaddassāpi vavatthitavibhāsatte vāsaddassāpi tādisattasseva paṭipādakatta
anya-e0806n1:110_19: vavatthitassa lakkhiyassa anurodhena lakkhaṇappavattikā vibhāsā vavatthitavibhāsā,
anya-e0806n1:110_23: imasmiṁ ṭhāne āgamattappakāsako ṭhāninidde sābhāvā ādesattāyogasaṅkhāto kāraṇaviseso samattho,
anya-e0806n1:112_2: lopoti yadi kammasādhano siyā tadā tena samānādhikaraṇaṁ katvā upari “parasaro”ti suttamārabhīyeyyāti byatirekamāha ‘na parasaro’ti,
anya-e0806n1:114_0: Tvaṁsi tvamasīti vikappo, idha na hoti tāsāhaṁ.
anya-e0806n1:116_0: Nanu vaggevaggantoti ettakeyeva vutte yasmiṁ (kismi)ñci vaggakkhare pare binduno yokoci vagganto aniyamena
anya-e0806n1:116_1: bhaveyya tathā sati aniṭṭhampi siyātyāsaṅkiya paccāsattiṁ sannissāyāniṭṭha nivattindassetumāha-
anya-e0806n1:118_0: Nanu saddattā byabhicārittā evassa tāva saddo hotu, saṁyato,
anya-e0806n1:118_1: saṁhitoti saddekadesabhūtānampi sambhavā tepi gahe tabbā siyunti ‘yaevahi saddesu’ti yahīnampi kathaṁ saddavohāro katoti āha ‘evā’tiādi,
anya-e0806n1:120_0: Yasadde pubbasutteneva saṁssapyādese siddhe so ( ) (tassa) (potthake) ya kāramatteyeva pare saṁsseva (yathā) siyāti suttamidamāraddhaṁ.
anya-e0806n1:122_0: Ṭhāninamāsilissa gacchati pavattatīti āgamo nāma, ko-
anya-e0806n1:122_3: sutte anuvattassa ca avijjamānattā ‘sarassā’ti kuto labbhatīti codeti ‘nanu ce’tyādinā.
anya-e0806n1:122_4: Āgamasutiyā vanādīnaṁ ṭhānisutiyā abhāvepi sāmatthiyā byañjanassa vā āgamo siyā sarassa vā,
anya-e0806n1:122_7: tasmā tadeva ñāpeti ‘saro yevettha ṭhānī bhavitumarahatī’ti.
anya-e0806n1:122_15: kaccāyanena ‘atippagokhotāvā’ti sādhanatthaṁ “kvaci o byañjane”ti okārāgamo gakārāgamo ca suttantarena vihito,
anya-e0806n1:122_17: ‘atippago kho tāvā’ti yaṁ vuttaṁ taṁ dassetuṁ ‘atippā’tiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0806n1:124_0: Dvādayo aṭṭhārasantā bahuvacanantāti ‘chakī’ti vattabbe ‘chā’ti ekavacanaṁ na yujjatīti codeti ‘nanucā’tiādinā,
anya-e0806n1:124_6: pariccatto jahito attho vidhinisedharūpo yassa taṁ pariccattattaṁ,
anya-e0806n1:124_11: anukāriyassāti ekādino saṅkhyā saddassa tadaññassa vā yadanukāriyamekādikaṁ tadaññaṁ vā saddarūpaṁ tassa.
anya-e0806n1:124_15: nukāriyaṁ dvisaddarūpaṁ tabbacanīyañca dvisaṅkhyāvisesamparāmasatīti tabbācakaṁ dvinnanti bahuvacanaṁ,
anya-e0806n1:124_16: atha ‘ḷañi’ti kasmā na vuttaṁ evañhi sati ñānabandhattāḷakāro ādyavayavo bhavitumarahatīti codanammanasi nidhāya ‘chasaddā’tiādimāha,
anya-e0806n1:124_17: antāpavādena vidhīyamāno ḷakāro cha saddā parassādissa āgamattā…pe…
anya-e0806n1:124_22: ādissāti iminā ḷassekavaṇṇattā antāpavādena “ādissā”ti sutte na ādyanto viyekopi saroti sarassādissa pattiṁ dasseti,
anya-e0806n1:124_27: Ādibhūtova hotīti asatipi ñakāre āgamaggahaṇānuvattiyā āgaminaṁ saraṁ avināsento tassa ādyavayavabhūtova hotīti attho,
anya-e0806n1:124_34: tattha hi sotaviññāṇavīthiyā laḷānaṁ visuṁvisuṁ gahaṇaṁ suti,
anya-e0806n1:124_35: taṁtaṁ desavāsīnaṁ lekhā va vatthānaṁ lipi,
anya-e0806n1:126_3: sādhūni bhavantīti vutti pāṭhassa atthaṁ vattuṁ ‘sādhūni bhavantīti nipātanato’ti āha,
anya-e0806n1:126_7: tesaṁ idha pāṭhāti tesaṁ tathā icchantānaṁ idhāti nipātassa imasmiṁ tadaminādisutte pāṭhā,
anya-e0806n1:126_8: uddhassa udūti uddhaṁ khamassāti aññapadatthasamāse uddhaṁkha iti ṭhite uddhaṁsaddassa uduādeso, asa-
anya-e0806n1:126_11: ‘pisitamasanā’ti “kvacaṇa” iti mahiyaṁ ravatīti ṭhite imināva gaṇanipātanena samāse kate mayūrasaddo nipphajjatīti dassetumāha ‘mahisaddasse’ccādi,
anya-e0806n1:129_9: veditabbāti iminā niruttasatthe ye saddā paṭipadaṁ nipphādiyanti tesamidaṁ sāmaññena nipphādananti dīpeti,
anya-e0806n1:129_10: dvāre niyutto dovārikoti ettha ṇike dakāravakārānaṁ majjhe okārāgamo,
anya-e0806n1:129_16: Atha vaṇṇavikāroti vuttattā javaṇṇassa yādese niyakādayo tāva sijjhantu,
anya-e0806n1:129_18: Aññathā vaṇṇasamudāyādesassa visuṁgahaṇe chabbitopattiyā ‘pañcavidhaṁ nirutta’nti saṅkhyāniyamo na yujjeyyāti bhāvo.
anya-e0806n1:129_22: Mayūroti ettha ravati mayūrarāve eva vattate,
anya-e0806n1:133_0: Yantaṁ saddānaṁ niccasambandhittepi pakkantavisayattā taṁsaddo yaṁsaddaṁ nāpekkhatetyāha-
anya-e0806n1:133_2: taṁ saddo hi pakkanta visayo tathā pasiddhavisayo anubhūtavisayo ca yaṁsaddaṁ nāpekkhate,
anya-e0806n1:136_0: Etissā gāthāya amhehi vitthāritanayena gahetabbaṁ, yathā rahanti sakammākammadhātūnamanurūpaṁ.
anya-e0806n1:138_0: Kiñcāpīdaṁ idaṁkiñcāpi (potthake) vikappanatthaṁ katanti heṭṭhimena ni(nnāna)ttaṁ viññāyati,
anya-e0806n1:138_2: heṭṭhime pana kvacādhikārā hakārantadhātuto dhyaṇpaccaye mehyaṁ,
anya-e0806n1:140_3: soyamattho sumaṅgalappasādaniyā khuddasikkhā ṭīkāya‘ādito upasampannā’ti ettha amhehi vuttanayena veditabbo,
anya-e0806n1:142_0: Yaṁvattateti vuttivacanaṁ nikkhipitvā tassa atthaṁ vattumārabhate ‘sambhavāpekkhāye’ccādi,
anya-e0806n1:142_1: yaṁvattateti ca sutte avijjamānepi gammamānatthassa saddassa payogampati kāmacāroti vuttiyaṁ vuttaṁ,
anya-e0806n1:142_2: yasaddassāniyamatthavuttittepi padavākyato nāññaṁ sambhavati vicchāyamābhikkhaññe ca vattamānanti āha ‘sambhavāpekkhāyapadaṁ vākyaṁvā’ti,
anya-e0806n1:142_5: tasmiṁ apekkhāya padaṁ vākyaṁ vā vattateti sambandho,
anya-e0806n1:142_7: nanu padassa vākyassa vā visuṁyeva dabbādayo atthā,
anya-e0806n1:142_8: taṁ kathamida metasmiṁ vattudhamme kiriyādhamme ca vicchābhikkhaññatthe vattateti anuyogaṁ sandhāyāha-
anya-e0806n1:142_10: vicchāya vattudhammassa kiriyādhammassa cābhikkhaññassa visayo padaṁ vākyaṁ vā…
anya-e0806n1:142_13: abhidhāyakattena ceti gocarattena pakāsakattena cāti attho,
anya-e0806n1:142_14: yaṁvattateti ajjhāhaṭassa yanti paṭhamantassa vibhattivipariṇāmaṁ dasseti (tassāti) ādinā,
anya-e0806n1:142_17: kathaṁ dve iccādesaniddesā ādeso ca sambandhīnamapekkhate,
anya-e0806n1:142_20: tasmā vicchābhikkhaññesu yaṁ padaṁ vākyaṁ vā vattate tassa dve bhavanticcevaṁ chaṭṭhīyattho sakkā vattu”nti,
anya-e0806n1:142_21: dve rūpāni hontīti dassitaṁ hotīti sambandho,
anya-e0806n1:142_22: saddarūpe saṅkhyayyeti dutiyā bahuvacanantaṁ paṭipādayamānoti ettha paṭipādanakiriyāya sambandhenopadiṭṭhaṁ,
anya-e0806n1:142_23: “vākyantaraṭṭhopi saddo tadaññasmimpi sambandhamupayātī”ti dvisaddoti idaṁ upari vākyadvayepyupayujjati ‘dvisaddo vutto,
anya-e0806n1:142_25: atha sarūpappadhāno kasmā na vuttoti āha-
anya-e0806n1:142_27: atha dveti sāmaññena vuttattā padavākyānaṁ ṭhāne dvibbacanaṁ vā siyā,
anya-e0806n1:142_29: tathā sati ‘yaṁvattate tassā’ti kasmā paṭhamameva nissāya vuttiyaṁ vivaraṇaṁ katanti āha-
anya-e0806n1:142_33: tusaddo pubbasmā pakkhā visesassa padassako visesanattho (potthake),
anya-e0806n1:142_37: yaṁ “ādasahi saṅkhyā saṅkhyeyye vattante”ti vacanato saṅkhyeyyavacano,
anya-e0806n1:142_38: tasmeha saṅkhyeyyaṁ saddarūpaṁ vā siyā āvutti vā,
anya-e0806n1:142_39: iccapi niddeso tadubhayamapekkhiya napuṁsakaliṅgena vā siyā itthiliṅgena vā,
anya-e0806n1:142_43: tadā saddassāvuttī uccāraṇalakkhaṇā kiriyā saṅkhyeyā bhavanti,
anya-e0806n1:142_45: tadā dvippayogo dvibbavacananti esa pakkhoti ayamettha bhāvo” yadā dve āvuttiyo vidhīyante tadā dvippayogo dvibbacanante sopekkho,
anya-e0806n1:142_46: (atra ṭhānyādesabhāvo natthi) natuṭṭhāne dvibbacanapakkho (potthake) āvutti hi kiriyā,
anya-e0806n1:142_48: na ca kiriyāya sādhanassa ca ṭhānyādesabhāvo upapajjate,
anya-e0806n1:142_55: te hi dutiyampi pakkhamabbhupagamma upacāramattato bhedo,
anya-e0806n1:142_59: ṇyo nasiyāti “tassa bhāvakammesu tta tā ttana ṇya ṇeyya ṇiya ṇiyā”ti (4-
anya-e0806n1:142_60: 59) bhāve vidhīyamāno ṇyo dvippayogapakkhe saddabhedasabbhāvā puna puneti samudāyasabhāvato punapuna
anya-e0806n1:142_61: bhāvoti atthe punapuna samudāyato na bhaveyyāti attho,
anya-e0806n1:142_63: atha kho ekapadantogadhānaṁ sarānaṁ sarānamādibhūtassukārassa bhavanto okāropi “sarānamādissā yuvaṇṇassā eo ṇānubandhe”ti (4-
anya-e0806n1:142_68: pubbapakkhepi hi dve saddarūpānyevādisīyanteti hoteva pada bhedo,
anya-e0806n1:142_74: aññatheti upacarito bhedo na sabhāvatoti ce,
anya-e0806n1:142_75: kāriyambhavatīti evi na sakkā vattunti sambandho,
anya-e0806n1:142_76: sabhāvato tvabhedo vāti upacārābhāvena vatthuto vijjamānabhedamavadhārayati,
anya-e0806n1:142_78: āvuttiyeva na siyāti etthāyamadhippāyo “yadi sabhāvatova bhedo bhinnassa pana kathamāvutti siyā”ti,
anya-e0806n1:143_6: tenāti yena bahuvacananiddesena sakiṁ byāpanicchā jotīyati tena karaṇabhūtena hetubhūtena vā,
anya-e0806n1:143_8: tattha ayañca gāmo ramaṇīyo ayañca gāmo ramaṇīyoti kamena byāpitumicchā,
anya-e0806n1:143_12: natthi sākallena kamena (potthake) byāpitumiṭṭhattanti sakalabyāpanicchāyābhāvoti na dvibbacanaṁ,
anya-e0806n1:143_17: ekamatthaṁ ñāpayissāmīti jātisaddo payujjate ane katthanissayāca vicchā,
anya-e0806n1:143_30: tassa saddassa yaṁ rūpaṁ atta bhāvo,
anya-e0806n1:143_31: tameva paccāsatyā “sutānumitesu sutasambandhova balavā”ti vicchā bhikkhaññesu vattamānassa sutasseva
anya-e0806n1:143_32: tassa rūpassa paccāsannabhāvato dvisaṅkhyā yuttaṁ dvisaṅkhātāya saṅkhyāya ‘rukkhaṁ rukkha’miccevaṁ yuttaṁ
anya-e0806n1:143_36: tathāhi sabbeyevetettha vicchāyaṁ dvittehyabhidhayanteti bahattā bahuvacanaṁ pappoti,
anya-e0806n1:143_37: ekavacanantu na sijjhati ‘rukkhaṁ rukkhaṁ siñcatī’ti ekatthābhidhānabhinnasabbarukkhappatītīti kathamekavacanantassa dvibbavacanantī āsaṅkiyāha-
anya-e0806n1:143_39: atthasāmatthiyāti ‘bahuvacanantappayogehi’ccādinā vakkhamānanayena bahuvacanantappayogeneva vicchātthajotanato na tattha dvībbacanaṁ siyā,
anya-e0806n1:143_41: e) kavacanattamantarena na cātthi dvibbacanāvakā soti patīti balāvagato yo- ttho,
anya-e0806n1:143_51: ato yevāti bahuvacanantassa saddasattiyā vicchājotanato dvibbacanābhāvāyeva,
anya-e0806n1:143_54: tattha kiñci sātthakānaṁ saddayogapajjamatthayoga pajjaṁ na sambhavatīti,
anya-e0806n1:143_55: yugapadi adhikaraṇaṁ dhavādi attho yassa sodhavakhadirapalāsasaddo yugapadādhikaraṇo,
anya-e0806n1:143_59: taṁ sahavacanicchāyanti iminā dassitanti tassaṁ sahavacanicchāyañca sati,
anya-e0806n1:143_60: sobhanā dhavakhadirapalāsā sobhanā rukkhāti sobhanaguṇayogepi bahuvacaneneva vicchājotanato dvibbacanābhāvoti,
anya-e0806n1:143_61: sobhanaṁ dhavakhadiranti pana satīpi saddayogapajje samāhārattā natthatthayogapajja nātvayāgapajja (potthake)
anya-e0806n1:143_62: nti ekavacanantattā dvittappasaṅgepi sobhanaṁ dhavakhadiranti saddānaṁ sakiṁ byāpanicchāyābhāvā na dvibbacananti
anya-e0806n1:144_3: atthevānupubbiyepi vicchā tatova dvittanti paṭipādaya ‘mānupubbiya’miccādinā ‘atthiyeveccādino vuttivākyassa vivaraṇamāha.
anya-e0806n1:144_4: Gāmajātiyā tulyajātiyānaṁ disā desādibhedena bhinnānamiva gāmānaṁ,
anya-e0806n1:144_11: na hi gogoti vutte (vāhīka)gatā vicchāvagamyateti ācariyajinindabuddhinā ānupubbiye vicchāyābhāvaṁ paṭipāditaṁ,
anya-e0806n1:144_12: taṁ vighaṭayituṁ ‘yadi hi’ccādinā yaṁ vuttiyaṁ vuttaṁ,
anya-e0806n1:144_17: yassūparibhāgo atthi tampi mūlanti mūla byapadesassāpekkhā katattamāha,
anya-e0806n1:144_19: tathā aññepi mūlaggabhāgāti iminā mūlaggabhedānaṁ heṭṭhā viya gahaṇe sati bahuttamāha,
anya-e0806n1:144_21: idaṁ vuttaṁ hoti “mūlādīnaṁ bāhullena thūlādi guṇayogammantvā sattamīvibhattiyuttena mūlādisaddasahitena
anya-e0806n1:144_22: sabba saddena mūlādikamatthamabhisaṁharitvā sabbasmiṁ mūle thūlā sabbasmiṁ agge sukhumāti evaṁ (vattuno)
anya-e0806n1:145_0: Jeṭṭhānaṁ vicchāsambhave sabbakaniṭṭhassa jeṭṭhattābhāvānuppaveso na siyāti ānupubbiyamattavacanicchāyaṁ
anya-e0806n1:145_9: vatticchādibandhaneti vattuno icchā nibandhanaṁ kāraṇamassāti samāso,
anya-e0806n1:146_3: atthappakāraṇādyanapekkhassa padassa atthe sakatthe avadhāriyamāne ettakameveti gammamāne anekasmiṁ diyyamāne
anya-e0806n1:146_5: ayampanesamadhippāyo ‘māsakaṁ māsakaṁ imamhā kahāpaṇā bhavantānaṁ dvinnaṁ dehī tyatra dve eva māsā dātumicchitā,
anya-e0806n1:147_0: Cattāro vihayo guñjā, dveguñjā māsako bhave;
anya-e0806n1:149_1: tattha na sabbe kahāpaṇa sambandhino māsā dānakiriyāya byāpitā,
anya-e0806n1:149_9: avadhāraṇe patīyamāneti kahāpaṇasambandhini bahumhi māsakasamudāye māsakadvayanicchaye viññāyamāne sati,
anya-e0806n1:149_10: avisesena sāmaññena māsānaṁ dehīti dānakiriyāya byāpanā bhāvāti sambandho,
anya-e0806n1:149_18: tadanu pana imamhā kahāpaṇātisaddantarasambandhe sati yadi kahāpaṇasambandhya na vasesamāsakavicchā pariggayhati
anya-e0806n1:149_20: imamhā kahāpaṇāti pana avadhipañcamīniddesato kahāpaṇato dvayameva gahetvā bhavantānaṁ dvinnaṁ dehīti
anya-e0806n1:150_3: pubbapaṭhamānaṁ pubbapaṭhama saddānaṁ atthātisayo yo atthassa pakaṁso,
anya-e0806n1:150_5: sabbapaṭhamabhāvasaṅkhāta atthātisayamattāva vacanicchāti na ettha vicchāti tesamadhippāyo,
anya-e0806n1:150_6: vikasanakiriyāya pākakiriyāyāti vuttepi vikāsakaraṇakiriyāya pākakaraṇakiriyāyāti atthasambhavato ‘pubbaṁ pubbaṁ puppha’nti tyādo,
anya-e0806n1:150_8: paṭhamaṁ paṭhamaṁ vacanaṁ karontīti kiriyāvisesanavasena attho daṭṭhabbo,
anya-e0806n1:150_9: pubbāti matā paṭhamābhimatāti iminā pubbapaṭhamabhāvenābhimatānaṁ bahutta byāpanena vicchāsabbhāve kāraṇamāha.
anya-e0806n1:151_0: “Ḍatara ḍatamānaṁ samasampadhāraṇāyamitthīnigade bhāve dve bhavantīti vattabba”nti (8- 1- 12-
anya-e0806n1:151_8: tasmiṁ itthiliṅge bhāve vattamānānaṁ ratararatamantānaṁ dvibbacanamabhimatanti sambandho,
anya-e0806n1:151_11: samena aḍḍhatādinā guṇena ime ubho aḍḍhā itvevaṁ rūpā sampadhāraṇā nirūpanā avabodho samasampadhāraṇā,
anya-e0806n1:151_14: aḍḍhatāya bahuvidhattābhāvā kiriyādiyo gābhāvā ca natthettha vicchāti tesamadhippāyo,
anya-e0806n1:151_15: pucchiyamānāti iminā ime ubho’ iccādīnaṁ pucchāvākyataṁ dasseti.
anya-e0806n1:152_2: iminā ākhyātādīnameva kiriyājotakapadabhāvena ponopuññasaṅkhātakiriyā dhammassa dhanasameva visayattaṁ dīpeti,
anya-e0806n1:152_3: atisayavisiṭṭhanti iminā papacatisaddepakāro pakaṁsattha jotako upasaggoti dasseti,
anya-e0806n1:152_10: 62) miccevāti evakārena paresamivāyamapyābhikkhaññe paccayo ce vidhīyate,
anya-e0806n1:152_11: tadā papacatiiccatra viya ābhikkhaññe vidhīyamānena paccayeneva ābhikkhaññatthassa pakāsitattā na dvibbacanena bhavitabbanti dasseti,
anya-e0806n1:152_12: yadā tu bhusaṁ punappunaṁ pacatīti vacanicchā tadāpi papacatīti bhavatyeva.
anya-e0806n1:153_1: ābhikkhaññe iccevāti iminā anukaraṇamattamevetaṁ natthetthābhikkhaññanti pāṇiniyā suttantarena dvittampaṭipādenti,
anya-e0806n1:153_4: evamaññate “paṭaiccetamanukaraṇaṁ bhavana kiriyampati vattatīti bhavanakiriyāmatī vuttīti (potthake) kiriyādhammaṁ ponopuññamettha atthevā”ti,
anya-e0806n1:153_8: rāppaccayoti paṭhamaṁ dvitte kate pacchā rāppaccayo,
anya-e0806n1:153_11: dīgho niccanti paṭhamaṁ dvitte paṭapaṭakarotīti ṭhite niccaṁ dīgho,
anya-e0806n1:153_12: paṭapaṭā karotīti ettha nipphattiṁ dassetvā idāni paṭapaṭāyatīti ettha dassetuṁ paṭapaṭāyatītiādi āraddhaṁ.
anya-e0806n1:155_0: Ekassa ekassa iti ṭhite pubbavibhattiyā lutte saṁhitāyañca katāyaṁ ekekassa,
anya-e0806n1:155_1: evaṁ matthakena matthakenāti ṭhite matthaka matthakenāti.
anya-e0806n1:157_0: Aññaṁ aññanti ṭhite iminā vibhattiyā lope akārassa “tadaminā” (1-47) dinā okāre aññoññantipi hoti.
anya-e0806n1:161_0: Kvaci pavatyappavatti, kvacaññaṁ kvaci vā kvaci;
